titleStmt.title: William Penn's last farewel to England being an epistle containing a salutation to all faithful friends, a reproof to the unfaithful, and a visitation to the enquiring, in a solemn farewel to them all in the land of my nativity.
Last farewel to England.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
